body: Page 31: Runes from Dragon's Crown... I sent the e-mail, got no answers yet.
Pages 10 & 11 are gold. Love those poses.
STAND: 「Filthy Acts at a Reasonable Price」STAND USER: 「Virgin Brat」

Good that they write down the exact amount of money transacted. Often it’s difficult to estimate how many ¥ changed hands when only an unspecified number of banknotes (sometimes without denominations) is shown.

"Do you want to play a game? If you can identify this font i'll translate a chapter from any manga or doujin you like. It's pretty obscure. Do you want a hint? I like dungeons and dragons. I'll only do it for the first person to answer correctly, unless i happen to feel like doing more. Yes, it's entirely arbitrary"
